title: Leading convention centers in Canada as of June 2017 , by size
yAxis: Exhibition space in thousand square feet
summary: This is a bar chart representing Buildings in the x axis and Exhibition space in thousand square feet in the y axis.
The Exhibition space in thousand square feet is highest at Buildings Enercare Centre and lowest at Buildings Vancouver Convention Centre.
There is a difference of 688.5 between the maximum Buildings Enercare Centre and minimum Buildings Vancouver Convention Centre.
